DOC.detailed_description: Mild Cognitive Impairment ( MCI ) syndrome define cognitive decline severe explain individual 's age education . One study United States find MCI caregiver experience distress association caregiver burden . The prevalence MCI people age 65 old range 3 % 19 % . Understanding process family caregiving provide knowledge base health professional develop effective intervention . However , little known phenomenon family caregiving patient MCI Taiwan . Therefore , purpose propose study develop theoretical model model-based intervention program family caregiver patient MCI Taiwan , pilot test clinical trial . To conduct small scale pilot randomize control trial ( total N = 60 ; 30 group ) pilot test intervention program . The intervention group receive caregiver training program , control group receive print sheet general information MCI dementia cause , course symptom . At 1 month , 3 month , 6 month intervention group complete two-session training program , group receive follow-up assessment preparedness , HRQoL depressive symptom . To minimize attrition , caregiver group receive monthly follow-up phone call first sixth month . Changes outcome variable analyze use hierarchical linear model , order provide reference formal clinical trial .
